content.1: And Israel took his journey with all that he had, and came to Beer-sheba, and offered sacrifices unto the God of his father Isaac.
content.2: And God spake unto Israel in the visions of the night, and said, Jacob, Jacob. And he said, Here
content.4: I will go down with thee into Egypt; and I will also surely bring thee up
content.5: And Jacob rose up from Beer-sheba: and the sons of Israel carried Jacob their father, and their little ones, and their wives, in the wagons which Pharaoh had sent to carry him.
content.6: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him:
content.7: His sons, and his sons’ sons with him, his daughters, and his sons’ daughters, and all his seed brought he with him into Egypt.
content.9: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
content.10: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.
content.11: And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
content.12: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zerah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
content.13: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
content.14: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
content.16: And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.
content.17: And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
content.19: The sons of Rachel Jacob’s wife; Joseph, and Benjamin.
content.20: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Poti-pherah priest of On bare unto him.
content.23: And the sons of Dan; Hushim.
content.24: And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
content.26: All the souls that came with Jacob into Egypt, which came out of his loins, besides Jacob’s sons’ wives, all the souls
content.27: And the sons of Joseph, which were born him in Egypt,
content.28: And he sent Judah before him unto Joseph, to direct his face unto Goshen; and they came into the land of Goshen.
content.29: And Joseph made ready his chariot, and went up to meet Israel his father, to Goshen, and presented himself unto him; and he fell on his neck, and wept on his neck a good while.
content.30: And Israel said unto Joseph, Now let me die, since I have seen thy face, because thou
content.31: And Joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father’s house, I will go up, and shew Pharaoh, and say unto him, My brethren, and my father’s house, which
content.33: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What
content.34: That ye shall say, Thy servants’ trade hath been about cattle from our youth even until now, both we,
